'''''"Jade, O Jade, Grant Me My Wish..."''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete [[Floating Jade, Treasure of Chenyu]].

==Trivia==
* The achievement's name is a reference to the 1986 Chinese animated series {{W|Calabash Brothers}}. In this series, the antagonist Snake Queen owns a magical artifact called {{zh|如意|rm={{w|Ruyi}}}} which can freeze enemies or conjure multiple weapons out of thin air. The mantra used to invoke its magic is {{zh|「如意如意，随我心意，快快显灵」|tl=Ruyi Ruyi, grant me my wish, manifest quickly.}}
